item.title: 经济学家称，明年初欧元区经济将受到特朗普关税的冲击：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社调查显示，大多数经济学家认为，欧元区经济将在明年初受到即将上台的美国特朗普政府的关税打击，这几乎确保了欧洲央行的一系列降息行动。【原文：The euro zone economy will be hit with tariffs from the incoming U.S. Trump administration early next year, according to a majority of economists polled by Reuters, all but ensuring a series of interest rate cuts from the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 劳合社调整 IT 和运营团队
item.description: 劳合社发言人周四表示，商业保险市场伦敦劳合社（SOLYD.UL）正在重组其数据、运营和变革部门，这将涉及外包这些部门的部分工作。【原文：Commercial insurance market Lloyd's of London (SOLYD.UL) is restructuring its data, operations and change departments, which will involve outsourcing some of those units' work, a Lloyd's spokesperson said on Thursday.】

item.title: 苏富比拍卖行与纽约税务欺诈案达成和解并支付赔偿金
item.description: 纽约总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）起诉苏富比拍卖行欺诈，帮助客户逃避数千万美元艺术品购买的销售税，苏富比拍卖行将支付 625 万美元并采取改革措施，以了结该诉讼。【原文：Sotheby's will pay $6.25 million and adopt reforms to settle New York Attorney General Letitia James' lawsuit accusing the famed auction house of fraudulently helping clients avoid sales taxes on tens of millions of dollars of art purchases.】

item.title: 资金短缺的美国农民转而使用非专利农作物化学品，对大型制造商造成打击
item.description: 美国农民在收入下滑和谷物价格低迷的困境中苦苦挣扎，他们在计划明年春播时已经开始转用更便宜的非专利杀虫剂和杀菌剂，市场分析人士称，这可能会打击拜耳等农化公司的底线。【原文：U.S. farmers struggling with slumping incomes and depressed grain prices have been switching to cheaper generic pesticides and fungicides as they plan for spring planting next year, which market analysts said could hit the bottom lines of agrichemical companies like Bayer.】

item.title: 默克与中国拉诺华公司签订价值 33 亿美元的抗癌药物协议
item.description: 默克公司与总部位于上海的拉诺华医药公司（LaNova Medicines）周四表示，双方已签署了一项价值高达 33 亿美元的许可协议，以开发、生产和销售一种实验性抗癌药物。【原文：Merck has signed a licensing agreement worth up to $3.3 billion with Shanghai-based LaNova Medicines to develop, make and sell an experimental cancer drug, the two companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒称美联储在完成任务方面进展良好
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周四表示，央行在努力实现就业和通胀目标方面取得了相当大的进展，但并未就这对近期货币政策前景意味着什么提供明确指导。【原文：Federal Reserve governor Adriana Kugler said Thursday the central bank has made considerable progress in working to achieve its job and inflation goals, while stopping short of offering firm guidance over what that means for the near-term monetary policy outlook.】

item.title: Coach 母公司 Tapestry 终止 85 亿美元收购 Capri 的交易
item.description: Tapestry 周四表示，由于美国法官阻止了对 Michael Kors 所有者卡普里公司 85 亿美元的收购，该公司结束了对该公司的收购，从而结束了创建一个可与欧洲主要公司竞争的美国奢侈品巨头的努力。【原文：Tapestry said on Thursday it was ending its $8.5 billion bid for Michael Kors owner Capri after the deal was blocked by a U.S. judge, ending an effort to create a U.S. luxury giant that would compete with major European players.】

item.title: 赫伯罗特首席执行官预计航运量将持续增长
item.description: 赫伯罗特首席执行官周四表示，他预计集装箱航运量将继续保持强劲势头。集装箱航运量受全球货物运输需求的推动，被视为贸易的代表和世界经济的健康晴雨表。【原文：Hapag-Lloyd's CEO said on Thursday he expects continued strength in container shipping volumes, which are driven by global demand for transporting goods and seen as a proxy for trade and a health barometer for the world economy.】

item.title: 死侍与金刚狼》帮助迪士尼超越盈利预期
item.description: 华特迪士尼周四公布的财报显示，受暑期档漫威电影《死侍与金刚狼》（Deadpool & Wolverine）火爆票房的推动，该公司的盈利超过了华尔街的预期，并对未来一年做出了乐观的预测。【原文：Walt Disney reported earnings that topped Wall Street's estimates on Thursday, propelled by blockbuster ticket sales from the rude and irreverent summer Marvel film "Deadpool & Wolverine," and provided an upbeat forecast for the coming year.】

item.title: 即将卸任的巴西央行行长表示迫切需要宣布削减开支
item.description: 即将离任的巴西央行行长罗伯托-坎波斯-内托（Roberto Campos Neto）对当地一家报纸说，巴西政府必须 "彻头彻尾 "地削减开支，而且迫切需要宣布一项备受期待的财政一揽子计划。【原文：The Brazilian government must cut spending "to the bone" and there is an urgency to announce a much anticipated fiscal package, outgoing central bank chief Roberto Campos Neto told a local newspaper.】

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所期货在鲍威尔讲话和美国数据公布前逐步上涨
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）于当天晚些时候发表讲话和美国经济数据公布之前，与加拿大主要股指挂钩的期货周四在原油价格的助推下上涨。【原文：Futures tied to Canada's main stock index rose on Thursday, helped by crude prices, ahead of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's speech and U.S. economic data later in the day.】

item.title: 在经济数据和鲍威尔讲话公布前，期指走势低迷
item.description: 美国股指期货周四持稳，投资者在等待新一批经济数据和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）稍后发表的评论，以寻找经济和货币政策前景的线索。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were steady on Thursday as investors awaited a fresh batch of economic data and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's comments later in the day for clues on the outlook for the economy and monetary policy.】

item.title: 中欧将感受到美国对德国加征关税的影响
item.description: 一位商界高层领导周四表示，如果美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普兑现对欧洲进口商品征收关税的承诺，匈牙利将因其与德国的贸易联系而感受到成倍的影响。【原文：If U.S. President-elect Donald Trump delivers on a pledge to hit European imports with tariffs, Hungary will feel the effects exponentially because of its German trade links, a top business leader said on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞价美国通胀故事的转折？
item.description: 阿曼达-库珀（Amanda Cooper）对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选后，加密货币行业推动政策巨变
item.description: 加密货币行业正在推动一系列雄心勃勃的政策，以促进数字资产的广泛采用，并考虑由谁来推动这些政策，因为他们预计当选总统唐纳德-特朗普将建立一个对加密货币友好的政权。【原文：The crypto industry is pushing for an ambitious raft of policies that would promote the widespread adoption of digital assets and considering who best to promote them, as they anticipate a cryptocurrency-friendly regime under President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，通用汽车将因变速器问题召回近 8 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周四表示，通用汽车公司将召回77824辆汽车，因为变速器控制模块中的错误软件可能会导致汽车向非预期方向行驶。【原文：General Motors will recall 77,824 vehicles as incorrect software in the transmission control module may cause the vehicle to move in an unintended direction, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，联合利华正在探索出售 Unox、Conimex 等荷兰品牌
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，联合利华正在探索出售部分荷兰食品品牌，这是首席执行官海因-舒马赫（Hein Schumacher）领导的扭亏为盈战略的一部分，目的是集中精力发展其最大的 "强势 "品牌。【原文：Unilever is exploring the sale of some of its Dutch food brands, three sources with knowledge of the process said, as part of a turnaround strategy led by CEO Hein Schumacher to focus on its biggest "power" labels.】

item.title: 欧盟表示，现在预订必须遵守《数字市场法
item.description: 欧盟委员会周四表示，酒店预订网站 Booking.com 在今年 5 月被指定为《数字市场法》规定的 "守门人 "后，现在必须严格遵守欧盟义务。【原文：The European Commission on Thursday said hotel reservation website Booking.com must now comply with strict EU obligations, following its designation as a "gatekeeper" under the Digital Markets Act in May.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，Blackstone 有意以 80 亿美元的估值收购印度 Haldiram 零食公司 20% 的股份
item.description: 消息人士周四告诉路透社，Blackstone 已放弃收购印度 Haldiram's 零食业务多数股权的计划，但目前正在讨论以 80 亿美元的估值收购 20% 的股权，这仍是一个症结所在。【原文：Blackstone has dropped plans to acquire a majority stake in the snacks business of India's Haldiram's but is now discussing purchase of a 20% stake at a valuation of $8 billion, which is still a sticking point, sources told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选可能放宽对马斯克机器人出租车的监管，但障碍依然存在
item.description: 随着特斯拉电动汽车销量在今年趋于平缓，该公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）越来越多地将公司的未来寄托在他对自动驾驶机器人出租车的愿景上，尽管在实现这些愿景的过程中面临着巨大的技术和监管障碍。【原文：As Tesla’s electric-vehicle sales have flattened this year, CEO Elon Musk has increasingly staked the company’s future on his vision for self-driving robotaxis, despite the massive technological and regulatory obstacles in delivering them.】

item.title: 欧元区 9 月份工业生产降幅超过预期
item.description: 欧元区 9 月份的工业生产降幅超过预期，其中德国的降幅最大，这表明人们期待已久的经济复苏可能会进一步推迟。【原文：Euro zone industrial production fell more than expected in September with Germany suffering the biggest fall among the bloc's largest nations, indicating than a long-expected recovery could be even further delayed.】

item.title: 欧元区就业率上升，GDP 增长数据得到确认
item.description: 周四的最新数据显示，欧元区上一季度就业人数增幅略高于预期，经济扩张速度可观，在经历了一年多的近乎停滞之后，欧元区经济软着陆的希望依然存在。【原文：Euro zone employment rose a touch more than expected last quarter and the economy expanded at a respectable pace, keeping alive hopes for a soft landing after more than a year of near-stagnation, fresh data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿提哈德航空九个月利润增长 66%，原因是客运量激增
item.description: 阿布扎比航空公司阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways）今年前九个月的净利润增长了 66%，这主要得益于客运量两位数的增长。【原文：Abu Dhabi carrier Etihad Airways reported a 66% increase in net profit in the first nine months of the year, helped by a double-digit increase in passenger traffic.】

item.title: 消费者支出疲软，中国剑网季度营收不及预期
item.description: 周四，中国电子商务集团京东商城（JD.com）的季度营收未能达到市场预期，原因是持续的经济困境迫使消费者减少支出。【原文：Chinese e-commerce group JD.com missed market estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, as persistent economic woes pressured consumers to cut back on spending.】

item.title: 电信集团 VEON 考虑让乌克兰 Kyivstar 公司在美国上市
item.description: 电信集团 VEON 首席执行官卡安-泰尔齐奥卢（Kaan Terzioglu）周四表示，VEON 正在考虑最早于明年在美国纳斯达克为其乌克兰子公司 Kyivstar 进行首次公开募股（IPO）。【原文：Telecoms group VEON is considering an initial public offering (IPO) for its Ukrainian unit Kyivstar on Nasdaq in the U.S. as early as next year, CEO Kaan Terzioglu said on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本 SMFG 上调利润预期，第二季度净收入增长 27
item.description: 三井住友金融集团（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group）是日本资产规模第二大的贷款机构，周四将其年度净利润预期上调至创纪录的 1.16 万亿日元（74.4 亿美元），此前该集团第二季度利润大幅增长 27%，部分原因是利率上升。【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group , Japan's second-largest lender by assets, raised its annual net profit forecast on Thursday to a record 1.16 trillion yen ($7.44 billion) after a 27% jump in second-quarter profit helped in part by higher interest rates.】

item.title: 人才北上，无国界欧洲抵御人才外流
item.description: 由于工人们利用贸易集团内部的自由流动规则，人才向较富裕的北方国家外流是南欧和中欧面临的一个问题。【原文：Talent flight to wealthier countries of the north is a problem for southern and central Europe, as workers take advantage of freedom of movement rules within the trade bloc.】

item.title: 俄罗斯高官绍伊古在最后一个交易日参观珠海航展
item.description: 这位前国防部长正在该国进行年度战略安全磋商。【原文：The former defence minister is in the country for annual strategic security consultations.】

item.title: 日本 MUFG 上调利润预期，第二季度净收入增长近一倍
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group）是日本资产规模最大的贷款机构，在第二季度利润因利率上升和出售交叉持股而激增之后，该公司周四将全年净利润预期上调至创纪录的 1.75 万亿日元（约合 112.3 亿美元）。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group , Japan's top lender by assets, on Thursday raised its annual net profit forecast to a record 1.75 trillion yen ($11.23 billion) after second-quarter profit surged on higher interest rates and the sale of cross-held shares.】

item.title: 巴宝莉在扭亏计划中重新关注风衣
item.description: 巴宝莉（Burberry）将利用其英国传统的吸引力，通过专注于风衣和围巾来赢回顾客，并降低手袋和鞋子的价格。【原文：Burberry will use its British heritage appeal to win back customers by focusing on trench coats and scarves and be less ambitious with prices on bags and shoes, the loss-making luxury brand said in a revamp that sent its shares up sharply.】
